comments:
I am having a problem with the Excel previewer and trying to document the issue for a Bugzilla ticket.  

I downloaded the bundle and all reports are failing like this when I try to view excel:

This looks similar to another ticket out there.  IS this fixed?

I downloaded the Eclipse Birt Bundle to test.  How would I apply any fix if one is created.

Sorry. I can't reproduce this issue in the latest build.
Please download the latest Nightly all-in-one build to check it.
Thanks.
